rule: The output must never consist of only one word, and it must represent an invalid part-of-speech tag or any unaccepted option other than "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
input: sentence: I found a python book., word: python
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single part-of-speech tag, 'NNP', which is present in the list of allowed tags in the description. There are no explicit violations detectable without knowing the input.
OK
